description: Phase 3: Time-of-day TP/SL multipliers on top of best ATR config (regime multipliers had no effect, keeping at 1.0)
notes: Total: 2^6 = 64 runs (~53 min). Best ATR config from Phase 1: SL_ATR=2.0, TP_ATR=2.5 (8526.44 PnL, 51.66% WR). Regime grid showed no variation, keeping regime detection OFF. Time profiles: EU morning (7-11 UTC), US session (13-17 UTC), Other hours. Expected to show variation based on 2.55x hourly PnL variance from earlier analysis.
